properties.areaDesc: Caribbean Waters of Puerto Rico from 10 NM to 17N
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 17 at 4:36AM AST until February 19 at 8:00PM AST by NWS San Juan PR
properties.description:
...Hazardous marine conditions are now expected by Monday
afternoon...

.A northerly swell with enhanced winds will result in hazardous
seas beginning Monday afternoon, and persisting through at least
Wednesday. Most of our local waters will be impacted by the seas
generated by the winds. Atlantic waters and passages will be
impacted by the swell from the north.

* WHAT...Seas 5 to 7 feet, building to 6 to 8 by Tuesday night
with east winds 15 to 20 kt and gusts up to 30 kt.

* WHERE...Caribbean Waters of Puerto Rico from 10 NM to 17N and
Mona Passage Southward to 17N.

* WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 8 PM AST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous for small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 PM AST WEDNESDAY
